updates.update_content:
Hey folks, just wanted to provide a quick update.
Plushies have all been produced and are on a boat heading to the fulfilment warehouse. This can take up to 60 days, so we're still on track for them to get to you guys by October.

Hey folks, just wanted to post a quick update.
Plushies and pins orders have been placed with the manufacturer about 4 weeks ago. Things are right on track!
I also received this photo from my manufacturer. A whole gaggle of mew-holders excited to make their way to their new homes!

Hey folks, just a quick update to let everyone know that backerkit surveys will be locked on April 21st.
This means you will no longer be able to change your choices after this date.
There are still 25 people who have not filled in their surveys! If you haven't filled in your survey, I cannot guarantee you'll receive your choice of plushies on time.

Hey folks, I hope everyone is enjoying this Easter weekend!
I'm just posting a quick update to say that 77% of the backer surveys are completed, that's great!
If you haven't filled out your survey yet, please do! Surveys will be locked April 20th, but the sooner I get the responses, the sooner I can put in the order with the manufacturer.

updates.update_userinfo: Backerkit Surveys have been sent out!
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone. You should all be receiving your Backerkit surveys shortly!
If you have any issues please reach out to me and we can fix things up! You can message me on Kickstarter or via e-mail @ Cutlootadventures@gmail.com. 
The survey deadline is a soft mid-April.  By then I hope to have a clear idea on how many plushies will need to be ordered.

We did it! We are fully funded!
Thank you so much to everyone who supported this campaign!
What's next
In the next 2 to 3 weeks the Backerkit surveys will be sent out after Kickstarter collects all the funds. This is where you will select your rewards and pay for shipping. You'll also be able purchase additional add-ons if you like.
We did it! The last stretch goal has been unlocked!
Sticker sheets unlocked!

Hey everyone! We're 1 week in, with another 2 weeks left to go! 
I'm excited to announce 2 new stretch goals!

project_data.project_name: LootCats: Gelatinous Cat Plushie

campaign.story:
The year 2020 is over! With that, let us celebrate with a little tongue-in-cheek spookiness and a brand-new season of The Dice Tower! Please join us as we raise funds to continue our coverage of board games and the wonderful people who play them.
We are a group of gamers dedicated to growing and promoting the board game hobby and those who enjoy it. Tom Vasel, Zee Garcia, Roy Cannaday, Mike Dilisio, and many others produce weekly videos covering hundreds of different games both new and classic. Additionally, Eric Summerer, Suzanne Sheldon, Mandi Hutchinson, and Tom produce a weekly podcast all about games and the people who play them.
But that's not all! We also provide you with news, variety shows (such as Board Game Breakfast), a series of popular "Top Ten" videos, shopping guides, and more! All of this can be found at our website - www.dicetower.com.
Our show gets a majority of its funding from our Kickstarter campaign each year. We have seven full-time employees and four part-time employees. Like so many of you, we had various plans last year which were disrupted.  We pivoted into a ton of live coverage instead.  This year our goals are to:
 Continue to produce regular live content on a set schedule 
Increase interaction with our listeners
 Continue to increase the quality of our current YouTube shows 
 Produce more top ten lists with special guests 
 Upgrade our equipment 
You might notice that these are very similar to our goals in 2020, and that's because I want to focus even more on the quality of our streaming.  The Winter Spectacular was something we worked hard on, and we believe we can bring ALL of our content up to that level.  In this campaign, we have a myriad of cool rewards but we hope that your main goal in supporting this campaign is keeping the Dice Tower on the air.
We are dedicated to keeping the show and our videos free for download and viewing, and we appreciate you helping us in reaching that goal.  We ask you to consider giving above and beyond the cost of the rewards to maximize what we can do this year!
PLAY

Going beyond our goal will allow us to do more for you on the channel!  Here are some of our stretch goals!

We have a pile of wonderful rewards to send out to you as a gift for backing our campaign.  We know the value of these rewards does not come close to the amount you are donating to the show but they are simply a small "thank you" gift that we are sending as a token of our appreciation.  We also ask that you look at them that way - to donate money to the show is the main goal of this campaign.
The following promos each have their own pledge level, but also can be added to a regular pledge.  Simply add the amount to your pledge and you can choose which ones you want at the end of the campaign.  Realize that some add-ons will accrue more international shipping at the end of the campaign.
There will also be some add-ons that are only added on in the pledge manager.  These will include (but are not limited to) promos from last year, and more!
We can only fit in a limited number of these rewards, so they are unlikely to be available in the pledge manager after the Kickstarter.
Each Thursday, we do a live show of Boardgame Breakfast!  Want to show us up in the trivia section?  Backers will show up live in one of our Thursday Breakfasts for the game show section!
Want your own Dice person?  Tina will draw you (based on a picture you send in) in the color die of your choice.  This is for non-commercial use, although the Dice Person may show up in a future Dice Tower video!

PLAY

A set of four (4) custom card trays.  These will hold at least 45 sleeved (American sized) cards and 60 unsleeved cards. Design isn't final - they will be clear plastic (same material as our component bins).  You will be able to push down on the cards to easily pull out the top card.  
A custom monster for use in both King of Tokyo and King of New York!
 A new scenario designed for Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion!  This will be sent out as a .pdf, and will use a map already included in the book, with a different story and set up.
Two sheets with ten different stickers - showing off our new Dice Monsters!
Five component bins - an awesome way to hold pieces both during gameplay AND storage.
If you missed our Rising Sun promo pack from our 2019 campaign, it's also here! 
Get one of our five new Dice Monster Pins! (choose which one after the campaign)
Pair of "double six" dice.  These are twelve-sided dice that roll very well, and have "1-6" printed on them twice.  The colors this year will be orange with black pips. (not currently shown)
Pair of custom blue-green six-sided dice that glow in the dark! (different than currently shown)
Get a set of ten Dice Monster Meeples to use in your games (two each of five). Artwork may change for final product.
Tired of using rubber bands to hold your boxes closed when traveling?  These high quality bands with a Dice Tower logo (will be in blue) do an amazing job at keeping the box closed.   Available in large size (games like Blood Rage, Ticket to Ride) and medium size (games like Carcassonne, Castles of Burgundy).  Five box bands per set.
Get a pouch in which to keep your dice! (Dimensions - 200x150 mm)   
Get a game tote to carry your games around! (Dimensions - 38x34x25 cm).  We are doing the same bag as last year, due to the amazingly great quality!
Get a small plushie Dice Puppy.  This lovable boy is based on Tom's new dog, Fuzzy.
Get a set of six rubber (neoprene) coasters.
A boxed 1000 piece puzzle, measuring 70 cm x 50 cm.  Will be almost the entire playmat in the picture.
We have a limited deck of Bicycle-made playing cards, designed by Zee Garcia, and using Tina Bongorno's art!   This set will be available this year only.
Tina also created custom art for Werewolf cards! This is a thirty card deck, fully playable on its own, but the backs are the same as Ultimate Werewolf from Bezier Games, so you can mix and match.  Tom's favorite roles are included, as well as one or two new ones!
Get our new 2021 Playmat!  (Dimensions - 23.75" x 14")   
Get our larger new 2021 Playmat!  (Dimensions - 25" x 20").  This mat also comes with stitched edges!
Get a pair of aluminum dice; some of the nicest dice we've ever seen!  Dice will be the same color, randomly chosen.  These are the same dice from our previous campaigns with some new colors. 
Tom will give you a verbal shout-out of thanks on two (maybe more!) of our video shows this year! 
The whole Vasel family and Dice Tower staff will sign and send you a Christmas card or birthday card.  Includes stickers!
Get one of our custom Dice Towers with new artwork for 2021!   There are four different dice towers.
One of the Dice Tower peeps will record you a short voicemail to use on your phone. (no commercial use, please).   You can choose from Tom, Zee, Eric, Roy, Mike, and possibly others from the show!
The gang at Dice Tower HQ will record a video for you or a friend.  Videos are a few minutes long and we'll do a congratulations, birth announcement, or whatever you want!  We need two months notice and will send the video to you a week before you need it.  
EVERY backer will get a digital smartphone wallpaper sent after the Backer Kit closes  by Katia Howatson from Board Game Art Creations!  It's a 3D meeple made up of smaller game pieces!
 Thanks to all our sponsoring publishers!
Check out our promo packs below!  And this might not be all!  We might add more to the packs, so keep an eye on our updates!  Many of the promos are still being worked on, so we'll also be adding artwork of the promos as we get it.  Publishers, if you want to be involved, contact us!

 A pack of new words for Just One, chosen by Dice Tower fans!
 A pack of new cards for Wavelength, created by the Dice Tower team!
 Some new monsters for MonsDRAWsity to draw!
 A deck of cards for use with the Sheriff of Nottingham game.
Two new cards for Onitama! 
 Some new "item" cards for Catacombs!
 A new card for Artemis project (different than last year)
A new improvement card for Creature Comforts. (pack of two)
 New cards for Fickle!
New promos for Chiseled!
 A new card for Tournament Fishing!
 A new card for Jurassic Parts
 A set of cards for Curmudgeon, the game where you insult others!
 A five card pack of word cards for Cloud Control.
 A new monster for the upcoming sequel to Near and Far, Now or Never!
Set of 5 completely new Achievements for your adventures in Nemesis: Lockdown. Those mini-quests will help you achieve your objective, allow you to survive, or derail your opponents' plans. The choice is yours!
These additional Laws might remind you of some crazy good board games show. I wonder what the gods were watching lately...
Four new Dungeon Cards for Lizard Wizard. These special, limited run of ‘Magical Forest’ card add-ons will include: 1) Satyr  2) Minotaur  3) Centaur  4) Faerie.
Foil Theatre 3 Card Promo Pack
New promo card for Underwater Cities!

 Promos for the upcoming game Fairy Tale Inn!
A pack of Special Requests for ArchRavels!
A new promo tile for Streets.
 A promo card for Anno 1800.
 A new card for Star Realms starring one very interesting looking mercenary.
A pack of promo cards for Sanctuary!
 A pack of promos for Dungeon Drop, Tavern Tales, and Drop Drive.
 A new card for Lost Ruins of Arnak!
 A new pack of bystander cards for Freedom Five!
 A Mercenary card for the upcoming Summoner Wars 2!
 New promo tiles for Isle of Cats!
 New promos for the upcoming After the Empire.
 New promos for Reavers of Midgard!
Special roof tiles introduce additional usage of your roof. Enough determination may help you build your roof with an upgrade, so it will provide you functionalities in addition to keeping your belongings dry. The better your roof is the more options you can unlock.  Upgraded roof provides additional pawns, which can be used around your shelter, to take advantage of the neighboring territories.
 Promo card for Watergate!
 A new promo card for Rossio!
A new promo card for Cafe!
Six new objective cards for Beez!
 New characters for Chronicles of Crime! (Will be used in a future scenario.)
Item Sets
                                   Now the way you equip your character matters even more! Use those sets to gain additional perks, but beware - each comes with a drawback of its own!
Awakened Items & Actions
                                   A couple of new Actions and Items inspired by Awaken Realms games. Gathering crystals, dreaming up a Menhir, or hibernating - all are now possible in the Dreamscapes of Etherfields!
A new rumor card for Folklore: the Aflliction
Foundations of Rome Promo pack containing 1 new Invocation card, 1 new Role card, 1 new Objective card
A new card for Paris from Devir! 
A new promo order card for Honey Buzz.
A foil card to replace one of the Medusa cards in Unmatched!
A flare gun for Summit!
 A new character for Furnace.
A new map for Captain Sonar!
New promo cards for the Magnificent!
A new promo card for Almanac!
A new promo card that can be used in Clank games!
New promo cards for Mandala Stones!
Five card pack for Conspiracy: Abyss Universe!
A courthouse card for Everdell.
New promo cards for Paladins of the West Kingdom!
 A pack of cards to be used in Adventure Tactics, with new villains!
 A new card for Genotype! (I also want that Tool Tower box!)
 An attraction tile for Dinosaur World!
 Three new cards for the Potions expansion for Hogwarts Battles!
SHIPPING
This year, we will be charging shipping in our pledge manager after the campaign is over.   We will do our best to get you good rates, and will work on that post Kickstarter.  Our goal is to have everything shipped by September, but we must wait on publishers and our manufacturers.  I've set firm dates, and we are hoping for the best!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Though this is not our first campaign, there are a number of factors worth mentioning. First, we are dependent on the publishers who make us the promos for our campaign. All deadlines for delivery of these promos to the Dice Tower have been communicated prior to launch. We do our best to work with publishers who have a high standard of excellence. 

We have also taken steps to improve the speed and efficiency of the deliverables for this campaign from past campaigns. Lastly, we have brought on more help specifically to help run this campaign, as well as to assist with fulfillment of deliverables to our backers.
Obviously, the world events have changed everything in 2020, but we have learned from that and hope to have things done faster in 2021.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: State of the Kickstarter: Pledge Manager starting this week, shipping information, video series, and new promos!
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!  A lot of information in this post, so let's jump right in!

We will be using Game Found as our pledge manager this year, and we plan to launch that this week!   You will be getting an email invitation to Game Found in the next ten days that will give you instructions on how to complete your pledge.  Everything you pledged for will be in your "cart", although you'll have the opportunity to add other things if you want to.
Once you get the invitation, I ask that if you can to complete it as quickly as possible.  This helps us know how many physical items to produce, and allows us to do time sensitive stuff in the correct time frame.

What else can we say at this point other thank a heartfelt thank you!?
We had such a fun, entertaining closing show that it wiped me out yesterday!  Sorry for the slight delay in posting here.

But now it's time to go to work!  Watch Board Game Breakfast this morning for an idea on how the year is going to go, with new shows, new ideas, and more!

updates.update_userinfo: Well, that's that. But there's more! ZEE (or someone) is WRONG.
updates.update_content:
So we've reached the final stretch goal, and we are amazed!

But there's more!  It's NOT the final stretch goal!

Last year, we did a fun series.  Roy, Mike, and Zee did a video called "Top 10 Games Tom is Wrong About"

Well, I am surprised that we've gotten to another stretch goal.  Huzzah and hooray!
A few things as we go to the final hours of the campaign.
We've added some card holders to the project!  This is something I've wanted for a long time - a container that holds cards in the box but also can be used during the game!

updates.update_userinfo: More Stretch Goals! The final push!
updates.update_content:
So we are in the final stretch of the Kickstarter.  As always, we super thankful for your support!
And we are in the process of getting our new shows planned out and ready to post during this year!

A few more stretch goals are on the horizon - a behind the scenes look at what happens at the Dice Tower, and more top 50s!

updates.update_userinfo: Two more stretch goals, playmat, EU shipping, and more!
updates.update_content:
Just a quick update to let everyone know what's going on.

- We hit two more stretch goals!  Dan & Cora will be doing their top 100, which we are all excited to see, and we're already working on plans for our publisher video series.  Anyone got a good name for this show?
- We got pictures of the large sized playmat with stitching!  Check it out!

Due to VERY popular demand, the puzzle is now 1000 pieces, and a larger size 70mm x 50mm.
I can't do both a 500 and 1000, but the feedback was strong enough that we changed it to the more popular one.
The pledge amount is unchanged.

First of all, a big thank you to everyone!  We hit yet another stretch goal, and we're just thrilled about how things are going so far.  We're also hard at work getting our top 100 games of all time ready, launching one week from today!
I've added a few more double card packs (Werewolf + playing cards) for those who want them, but the big news is a puzzle!
We're getting a 52 by 38 cm puzzle (2mm thickness) of the playmat picture!  This will come in a box, and once you build it, make a nice centerpiece for your wall!  We're adding a separate pledge for anyone who wants it, but you can also add it to your existing pledges for $25.

Secondly, if you want to help us grow and succeed, then we ask that you signal boost the campaign!  Tweet it!  Facebook it!  Tell people about it.  The more word is spread, the more people know about it.

project_data.project_name: Dice Tower - 2021

campaign.story:
I am so grateful for all your support! The campaign is now closed, but there is still work ahead. It is a privilege to be given the opportunity to create (and now keep creating) for the game we love!  

Quick links
Keep up with project updates here! 
Check out natwuns.com to subscribe to our newsletter and peek at our other social media links so you always know what's going on with us!
You can contact me on any of those platforms. If you are interested in the book but came late, you can follow us on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram to get notified when the book is available for purchase. Keep your eyes peeled -  Natwuns is here to stay! 

Cheers,
Karl Nicolas
---
Tattooists can be found across the land...
Hi folks! It's taken a while and a little bit of courage but I've decided to try and release a fully-illustrated compendium of all the magic tattoos I have created over my time DMing for my parties. Magic tattoos are special in that they allow you an extra level of character customization (look that much more badass) while simultaneously granting you unique and interesting abilities (be that much more badass)! Why not give it a shot, right? There will be more than 120+ illustrated, never-before-seen, and functional magic tattoos, with much more to come depending on the stretch goals we reach!
The tattoos will also all be tweaked to be more in line with the ones being introduced to us in recent 5e releases. All the tats you'll find in this book will have some amazing flavor of their own, which will set them apart from the limited selection of existing magic tattoos and the large pool of magic items already out there!
The Elongating Tattoo presents some interesting new opportunities...
For one, all the magic tattoos you will find in this book are tailored to work in tandem with specific body parts! For example, tattoos like the Soaring Tattoo will grant you majestic inky wings when applied on your back (and only your back)! The Tome of Mystical Tattoos will also show you exactly how each beautiful tattoo would look on the optimal limbs alongside a detailed flat sketch for a clear view of all the designs. Beautiful full-page illustrations are also in the works showcasing the wide variety, utility, and power of the tattoos within this compendium. 
Honestly, the best way to show you the type of quality and content you can expect from this project is simply... to show you! You can click up there to download a sneak peek which includes some of the new tattoo mechanics, and at least 2 fully-illustrated and fleshed-out tattoos from each of the six sections of the Tome of Mystical Tattoos. 
Hey again! I'm Karl Nicolas (he/him), a librarian, writer, and editor. I also manage the day-to-day of Natwuns as the creative director. We create beautifully illustrated maps for tabletop games along with other assets. This can range from monsters and NPC characters to magic items or comics, depending on our mood! I'm an avid D&D player and DM, and I am thoroughly in love with the imagination and creativity that this beloved game inspires. For this project, I want to produce the best possible book that I can for all of you, and I'll be working with some talented editors and artists to supplement my work in whatever way possible to deliver on that promise! 
You can also check out our website at natwuns.com to subscribe to our newsletter, check out our social media to follow along with this project's progress, and anything else coming down the pipeline.
Tattooist's Tools... I wonder what those do...
This wouldn't be as much fun if we didn't fiddle around with the system a little, right? In the Tome of Mystical Tattoos, I will outline a system that explains the mechanics of things like obtaining tattoo designs, recreating found designs, and how the new artisan's tool - the Tattooist's Tools - fits into all this. I promise this will be a fun addition and something that you can forego completely anyway if you're only interested in some kickass tats! 
Unlocked Stretch Goals
$5000 - UNLOCKED - 10 more tattoos in the "Head" section of the book - a total of 30 instead of 20! (Total 130 tattoos in the book)
$7000 - UNLOCKED - A total of at least 4 full-page illustrations instead of just 2 in each section. (Total 24 full-page illustrations in the book)
$9000 - UNLOCKED - 10 more tattoos in the "Neck" section of the book - a total of 30 instead of 20! (Total 140 tattoos in the book)
$11,000 - UNLOCKED - A new and unique class that interacts closely with tattoos will be included in the book - the Tattooist!
$13,000 - UNLOCKED- 10 more tattoos in the "Arm" section of the book - a total of 30 instead of 20! (Total 150 tattoos in the book)
$15,000 - UNLOCKED - A total of at least 6 full-page illustrations instead of just 4 in each section. (Total 36 illustrations in the book) 
Note: I will also be creating a digital companion artbook to fully showcase the beautiful work done by the artists on this project. It will be available to download free for all backers! 
$17,000 - UNLOCKED - 10 more tattoos in the "Leg" section of the book - a total of 30 instead of 20! (Total 160 tattoos in the book)
$19,000 - UNLOCKED - Free digital item cards of all the magic tattoos included in the book will be provided to backers of all tiers!
$21,000 - UNLOCKED - 10 more tattoos in the "Chest" section of the book - a total of 30 instead of 20! (Total 170 tattoos in the book)
$23,000 - UNLOCKED - I will create a complete adventure that will be included within the book! Players can embark on a challenging quest to rescue and gain access to the services of a legendary tattooist!
$25,000 - UNLOCKED- 10 more tattoos in the "Back" section of the book - a total of 30 instead of 20! (180 tattoos in the book)
(NEW) $40,000 - UNLOCKED - 5 "Tattoo Sets" - 5 entries in the book for a new mechanic that rewards players for applying three specific magic tattoos to create a full tattoo set. Along with the three tattoos' existing abilities or properties, the player gets additional benefits that reward their devotion to mystical tattoos!
(NEW) $50,000 - UNLOCKED - 5 "Cursed Tattoos" - 5 entries in the book for a completely new mechanic exploring the fearsome cursed tattoos! These tattoos are extracted into weapons which become the special medium for their application on enemies, as opposed to needles, and are temporary in nature.
(NEW) $60,000 - UNLOCKED - 5 "Divine Tattoos" - 5 entries in the book for a new tattoo type that I will refer to as the powerful divine tattoos. These are full-body tats designed to replicate tattoos observed on legendary deities which allow the tattooed individual to wield some of that divine being's power!
Locked Stretch Goals
Community Poll can be found here! Our final stretch goal will be making one of the top three results a reality! (or maybe more...? Stay tuned)
instagram.com/natwuns - 1056/1000 followers - Sun God's Steed Alternate Cover + Sun Deity Tattoo (UNLOCKED)
facebook.com/natwuns - 528/1000 page likes - Thunder God's Rage Alternate Cover + Thunder Deity Tattoo (UNLOCKED at the eleventh hour)
twitter.com/natwuns - 499/1000 followers - War Goddess' Shield Alternate Cover + War Deity Tattoo (UNLOCKED at the eleventh hour)
You can count on the book having a plethora of phenomenal tattoos for you to use in your campaign, but you also need to be able to see how epic the tattoos can look - whether on your character's flesh or in action! We've got you covered! 
Gills? Nope, that's definitely a mystical tattoo!
Summoning is not beyond the magical tattoos in this book.
Neither is domination for that matter...
Would you like a full magical sleeve, perhaps?
No body part is off-limits! Well... maybe some.
After you choose to back this project for the hardcover book reward in one of our tiers, you will be sent a link to purchase the book at cost from DriveThruRPG. DriveThruRPG Print on Demand services will print the book at-cost (this would probably be in the range of $15 to $25 US) and then shipping costs to your address will be calculated. This is honestly the most cost-effective way for you to receive the hardcover book, especially at this time. It reduces overheard and allows you to buy the book cheaper than if I opted to include the printing and shipping costs in the Kickstarter reward.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The risks to completing the project are very low. The tattoo effects are all close to completion, most with illustrations already in the works. More artists will be hired to deal with increased workload if necessary the moment any stretch goals are met. The biggest risk might be shipping delays due to COVID-19 but we will ensure digital copies will go out on time regardless.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hello folks! 
Our story's wrapped up here but I just wanted to draw attention to Heliana's Guide To Monster Hunting one more time! I am personally very excited about this project and I encourage you all to lend their amazing team your support. Max (Humperdink's Wares) was instrumental for the Tome of Mystical Tattoos and he is at the helm of something very epic now. Give the project a look if you haven't already! 
Will be back with more updates for my next project later!
Karl

Hi folks! 
The process of looking over the final proofs have been completed as of yesterday! What does this mean? Well, it means I can safely announce that everyone's at-cost print codes will be ready as of mid-June (that means one or two weeks)! In preparation for this, please make sure that those of you in the at-cost print code tiers fill out the single remaining question I added onto your BackerKit surveys if you haven't already. You can access the survey here or through the reminder email BackerKit sent out a week ago. I'm just as excited as you for this last step - thank you all so much for seeing this campaign through from beginning to end!

(Edit: If your BackerKit survey is still locked, don't worry. I'm in contact with BackerKit and we'll get that sorted out soon!) 

Hi folks! 
Here are some books that came in recently that I've been reading:

Hi folks!
With some unexpected (but welcome) help from Michael—one of our backers—we were able to create a Magic Tattoo Catalog. This is essentially a spreadsheet wherein you can sort the tattoos by things such as rarity and body part to find the corresponding (print or digital) page number. This has been requested a few times now. Hope this helps you enjoy the book even more! Also, if you find any errors or corrections that need to be made within the file, just shoot me a message.

campaign.story:
hello again friends!
I am very excited to present the new kickstarter, which was born from your ideas and contributions from the previous successful KS of Gangsters Bang!
In this one, we extend the collection by taking it to the darkest stories of Lovecraft!
And following the same line as the other edition, the basic pack will have 12 characters and some accessories, of course more will be created during this month that will be added to the streach goals or will be added as a gift!
let's get started!
Cthulhu Adventures basic pack!
The basic pack will have 12 characters, which will not have names, for those who bet on the license will be free to use the one they want, composed of very varied characters,a doctor, researchers, the house maid, cultists ..., that fit in the 20s and 30s like Gangsters bang!
and some accessories so they can interact in the environment!
Cthulhu Adventures pack Lovely version!

Of course! 
one of the successes of the previous KS was to present two versions of the characters, and they are still very adorable!
just like the normal collection, 12 characters are included in the chibi version ready to print!












Free model!
Are you not decided? here you have one of the models for free to help you!
 Accesories
The basic pack not only has characters, but also various transportations and decorations to add to your board game and to be able to interact with them or to protect yourself from monsters!


the scale of these accessories change in the chibi version
stretch goal
the fun of all the KS! Once we reach the goal, more things will be unlocked that will be added to the basic pack and all the rewards will be received!














Modular (UNLOCKED 3500)

                                                                You already know that you can't lower the level! and I want to put this ... Streach Goal!
                                                                will be unlocked at 3500
                                                                Why?
                                                                this sculpture needs a lot of testing and time, the advantage? will enter the pack without additives, unlike the first KS


 Additional features! those gifts that you like so much!







 Print test
(SPOILER)
pro-support file print tests for @rpg_print_play_escape
pro-support file print tests for @rpg_print_play_escape
PLAY


printed and painted by Matthew Simpson
Print and paint by Mike marshall
Print tests at Ender for Antonio Miguel Martorell Ferriol


Add-on
In this section you can see what you can add to your reward!
When you select your contribution, add the amount of the addition you want
 Monsters +6
Space chibis +10e
Rodents of the moon +10e
Gangster Bang 1.0 (regular version) +20e
For information on what this pack includes visit: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/therodentsofthemoon/gansters-bang-miniatures?lang=es
Miniature photographs of the previous KS of the original Gangster Bang, wonderful contribution by Georg Dierkes
Gangster Bang 1.0 (Lovely version)+20e
For information on what this pack includes visit: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/therodentsofthemoon/gansters-bang-miniatures?lang=es

Licences
The rewards of 35 and 70 euros will give sale rights of the prints of the characters and accessories, non-exclusively, under the name of Celia Miniatures, the sale of the files or their mass production will not be allowed, for this you will have to contact me personally.
The files can be modified to print in different sizes but the modified files cannot be sold.
All other rewards are for personal use only.
Why have license prices been raised?
                                               in the earlier kickstarter the number of models was smaller! and it went up as the month went by, in this case the number of miniatures is the same as the first with streach goal! and it will go up as the month goes by, so we can expect more than 60 models
About me.
Many of you know me from the first KS that I was lucky enough to present, the rodents of the moon.
After this little success came a bigger one, I was able to present Gangsters Bang, a very interactive KS where the backers themselves gave ideas so that more content could be added.
In parallel to this, I have worked for several companies, from Reaper miniatures or Mantic.
Recently collaborating with Midknight heroes and Ignition Core Games.
thus being able to guarantee my work
Recommendations

updates.update_content:
Hello friends! I am addressing chibis lovers !!
In Ks I was combining two styles and now, focusing on chibis, I have inaugurated a patreon dedicated to them, you can get about 9 minis a month! I want to hear your ideas and develop them!
This month we started with classic monsters, they already suggested it to me for the Ks but, taking advantage of this start they will be the first

Hello friends!
these days I have sent the new links!
Please see that they arrive correctly, tell me if you have any problems and of course I hope you enjoy them
if you miss something let me know

Yes, WE GET IT

no i have no words i am ecstatic
why did you do it again
It has been a very hard year, a lot of effort, a lot of work and of course a lot of support, and one of the biggest motivations I have had has been that you love these miniatures, you have welcomed them so quickly and so well ..
that right now I can only say thank you, typical
but my voice does not come out, you have surprised me.
Congratulations to everyone for this beautiful project, I hope you can release them all next month! of course many of them will arrive before, and of course I will be there for doubts, questions, problems!

Facebook
celiaminiatures
Instagram @celiaminiatures
my email celiaminiatures@gmail.com

I am always at your disposal, thank you very much !!
it was really ... awesome

Hello friends!!
I have to welcome a lot of people! We entered the last 9 hours and it's great !! I feel very supported, thank you very much, of course to say that the jazz band is super unblocked, it will not be one of the first miniatures that you will receive because they are still in process, the chibi and regular versions.
and so.. countdown!

campaign.story:
Dice Heads are back once again with another massive bundle of awesome Monsters and Heroes for all your RPG tabletop needs! This campaign is for printable STL files to print at home! The bundle contains 88 miniature and multipart models plus all stretch goals reached!!


A range of separate bases are included in the bundle.




 The Main Bundle!
 The original Dice Heads bundle contains a whole raft of cool monsters and heroes with a unique style to either hold a D20 or a D20 actually sculpted into their head!
However, we know that a lot of folks like to use their chibi minis in game play and this set just wasn't practical. With that in mind we've gone back and re-sculpted the entire set!
 We're adding the new re-sculpts completely for FREE to all pledge levels! Check 'em out! 
 Awesome Add Ons
Missed out on previous Dice Heads campaigns? No worries! Here is your chance to add more chibi awesomeness to your bundle! Simply select the Add-On pledge level you require!
The original Dice Heads Dice Holder Bundle! 50 Characters each with a different variant to hold different RPG dice! Check out this update for more info.
The Lovecraft inspired Chibi range! All models come pre-supported! 
Check out this update for more info.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As a veteran of 15 previous Kickstarters and a backer of over 100 campaigns I'm well aware that each project can contain risks. However, For this campaign all the files are already created and tested so sharing the files with backers will be an easy task. I will be using My Mini Factory as a fulfilment platform.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Just a quick one to let you know that I have now added a set of zipped folders so you can bulk download the bundle via MMF. Simply log on and look for 'Fantasy RPG Mini Kickstarter Bundle'.
Also, as you know, I love to share exciting new projects from other creators! Check out these bad-ass models!

updates.update_userinfo: Zipped Files Now Available on MMF
updates.update_content:
Hey there,
After a few days since the Pledge Manager went live it looks like any bugs have been smoothed out. 
A zipped version of the bundle will be available to download from MMF after the weekend.
Thank you so much for supporting Dice Heads on Kickstarter! Your support has meant that I can devote more and more time to creating these models.

updates.update_userinfo: More Dice Head Fun? Heroes Of Zoontalis
updates.update_content:
Hi there,
Thank you so much for your patience whilst the Pledge Manager was delayed over the Christmas period. I'm happy to let you know that it has now gone live on My Mini Factory and you should be able to access your bundles! My Mini Factory will be sending out an email shortly.
If you have chosen an Add-On pledge level you will be able to select which one you want via the Pledge Manager

Hi there
I hope you all had a great Christmas break. I've just heard from My Mini Factory who have given me a release date of the 5th January. A little later than I was planning but the Christmas break had thrown things a little off. The MMF crew will be back at full capacity at this point to offer support if needed.
In the meantime here is a free model to keep you going until then:

campaign.story:
The Librarians: Adventure Card Game is an all new Licensed Card and Board Game based on the hit TV Series - "The Librarians" and the made for TV Films such as "The Librarian: Quest for the Spear". 

This game offers an immersive co-op/solo experience for 1-4 players. Illustrated using tons of High Quality Stills from 4 Seasons of the TV show and the films, with clean icons and an intuitive layout, it will take you on a fantastic journey set in the action adventure family friendly universe of The Librarians! 
1) Only Kickstarter will help make this dream a reality! (We need YOU and your support to make this game! We can't do it without YOU!)
2) Get EPIC Exclusives only available on Kickstarter! (not at retail)
3) Help make the product even more EPIC with awesome EXCLUSIVE  Stretch Goal Unlocks!(See our stretch goal section below!)
4) The Librarians need your help! Bring back all the epic memories by helping us make this game! 
5) ONLY BY BACKING ON KICKSTARTER YOU CAN GET: 
- The Jenkins Hero Expansion Pack! (KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE)
- Epic Stretch Goals: Alternate Art Cards, Unique Deck Boxes, and even MORE content only for Kickstarter Backers! (KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE)
- Collector's Edition only available on Kickstarter! (KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE)
 Each Hero has different strategies and playstyles! With pre-generated deck lists to start the game, and tons of deck customization options with unique cards that unlock as you play!  
The Librarian: Quest for the Spear - Expansion 1 includes: The Flynn Carsen and Nicole Noone (Artwork WIP) player decks as well as an all new fully replayable Adventure Mission to embark on! 
The Jenkins Character Pack - Expansion 2 includes: Jenkins with his own unique deck and playstyle!  
NICOLE NOONE ART IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. :) WE WILL UPDATE AS SOON AS IT'S COMPLETE!
 ALL STRETCH GOALS ARE KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE AND LIMITED EDITION! THESE WILL NOT BE IN THE CORE BOX AND WILL NOT BE IN RETAIL STORES!
***They will be packaged separately and given to Kickstarter Backers Only!***
  ***DON'T FEEL LIKE READING? WATCH REVIEW AND PLAYTHROUGH VIDEOS IN THE NEXT SECTION BELOW!***
Jump into the game quickly with a pre-generated deck tailored to each Hero's persona in the show, each with a unique playstyle. Once you know the game, deck customization options allow you to play your character YOUR way. Change and evolve the characters influencing their fate! How would Jacob Stone turn out if he embraced magic? 
Each story has a deck of unique cards designed to create a thematic experience with a mechanical twist that keeps the game feeling fresh and new. Each time you win an adventure, you find new allies and recover new artifacts that you can bring along in future missions! Maybe you'll find the legendary Excalibur to help you on your quest!
Prepare for the upcoming mission and rounds to come! Choose cards that best suit the upcoming dangers or that can help optimize your Hero!  Also, remember you can use cards to help your other players cooperatively! 
Actions are resolved using an innovative die-rolling mechanic that takes into account your character’s skill and the difficulty of your check. Best of all, any player can discard a card to change a die result or to change another player's die result to help them! It's a Co-op game! Work together to win! 
You have the control over the dice, ensuring that no card is ever dead in your hand, and creates a collaborative atmosphere where you need to help each other out. Each turn you get the chance to prioritize drawing new cards, or gaining the energy needed to play them. The decision is yours!  This adds replayability to the game and makes each session unique depending upon your choices! 
Enemies will try to defeat you and your fellow Librarians! Work together cooperatively to spread enemies amongst each other and choose your battles wisely!  Each Librarian has their own specialties and each enemy is different! Discuss amongst your group who is best to deal with each enemy or obstacle that spawns on your adventure!
FINISH THE STORY AND WIN THE GAME BEFORE THE ENEMY DOES! PROTECT THE LIBRARY AND SAVE THE WORLD! IT'S ALL UP TO YOU! 
MAN VS MEEPLE PREVIEW
ROB OREN'S PREVIEW
 ONE STOP CO-OP SHOP PREVIEW 
ONE STOP CO-OP SHOP PLAYTHROUGH
PLEASE REMEMBER: THESE ARE ESTIMATES AND ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE. :)
Our Epic Game Designer:
Who is Everything Epic?
We're a small, but passionate independent board game publishing house with one goal, make EPIC games! We've come a long way since we were founded in 2013 and we can't wait for you to try our EPIC games! This is our 18th Kickstarter Campaign and we're more excited than ever to bring YOU, The Librarians!  
THIS GAME IS LOVINGLY CRAFTED BY EPIC FANS AT: 
THE LIBRARIANS ADVENTURE CARD GAME IS AN OFFICIALLY LICENSED PRODUCT OF:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 18th Kickstarter Campaign, and there are usually some vague areas in terms of timing when it comes to anything normally produced in China, such as:
Production delays
Shipping delays
Customs delays
Due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards later than others, but this is normal as with all Kickstarter campaigns.

We know what it takes to print a big & EPIC game. Big Trouble in Little China the Game, Rambo: the Board Game, and Secrets of the Lost Tomb, our first title ever, had 14 SKUs including expansions and miniatures.

That means we have produced an astounding amount of different boxes of game products for our past campaigns.

We endeavor to please our backers in any way we can! We want you to enjoy our games, our stories, and our creations to their fullest. If there is anything that we can ever do to make your experience better, we're always here to help!

Our Motto is "Of the Gamer, by the Gamer, and For the Gamer!" we know what it's like to be Ignored by Project Creators, to never get an email back from a Game Company, to have to post on a blog to get a response... We're not Like that... Here's the President of our Company's email... Chris@EverythingEpic.us you can email me directly for anything you ever need and I will always respond to you directly and help in any way I can.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Highly durable cardstock and box!
Reusability and recyclability
We will try to package this game so that it is as efficient as possible while manufacturing so that the packaging is all useful rather than items to be thrown out.
Sustainable materials
Recycled cardstock and paper in the game.
Environmentally friendly factories
We look for factories who go above and beyond to have certifications that show that they care about the Environment.
Sustainable Distribution
All shipping will be done at one time to help with faster shipping routes and less changing of shipping hands to help ship within countries and not multiple.

Please note that shipping cost is not included.

Custom-printed slipcase

support.title: Retailer tier

2× Judges Guild Deluxe Collector's Edition, Volume II

support.title: LEATHER Deluxe Collector's Edition

INCLUDES:
Judges Guild Deluxe Collector's Edition, Vol II, bound in leather

support.title: Lifetime Commercial Set
support.descp:
Under this tier, you will have the exclusive right to sell the *printed* versions of these models in your shop. This license extends to all stretch goals and bonus files.
By purchasing this tier you agree to credit me as the artist in all sales.
You cannot sell or redistribute the files in any way.
Photos used in your shop must be your own, you cannot use my renders to advertise.
You must print and photograph the products yourself.
INCLUDES:
Core set of STLs
Unlocked Stretch Goal STLs
Lifetime Commercial License

support.title: Retailer (Deposit)
support.descp:
We know this are trying times so contact us in private message to review your particular situation (we have an affiliate program). We acknowledge the importance of your role in the industry and we want to offer you the benefits included in this level. Proof of business will be required after the campaign ends; the pledge manager will be ready for you with no need of messaging prior your order and you will be able to add extra copies at wholesale price (50% off) and volume (x5). Read the retailer section for more info. 1st Print run for this game is likely to be available only through Kickstarter.

50% off MSRP for game or add-ons
1 free Demo Copy for your store
Straight forward Self-service on Backerkit
Referral link to host preorders

support.title: TIP JAR
support.descp: Our entry-level contribution. Receive backer-only updates and access to the post-campaign BackerKit store to stay up to date with the progress of AFK Season 3.

support.title: STREAM IT FIRST
support.descp:
Be the first to stream new episodes of AFK with our producing partner, The Fantasy Network! This reward Includes a month's access to TFN and access to our backer-only updates.

Stream AFK episodes with one month of Fantasy Network access

support.title: ACCESS ALL AREAS
support.descp:
This reward level will give you access to our behind the scenes production diaries which will be shot leading up to and throughout production as as we bring the story of AFK to a close. Have early access to see all the (inevitable) trials and tribulations throughout the making of AFK.
INCLUDES:
Access to Production Diaries
Stream AFK episodes with one month of Fantasy Network access

support.title: DOWNLOAD IT!
support.descp:
See the new AFK episodes first, and get to keep them! You will get access to stream all new episodes of AFK before they go live to the general public. And then, once they are live, you'll get HD digital downloads of all the episodes to keep and rewatch wherever and whenever you want!
INCLUDES:
Stream AFK episodes with one month of Fantasy Network access
HD Digital downloads of new episodes
Access to Production Diaries

support.title: SEASON THREE DISC & DIGITAL MAP
support.descp:
Backers at this level will receive a region-free DVD or BLU-RAY of AFK Season Three, plus a digital download of a lovingly created map of 'Sendarion', the world where AFK takes place. Trace the journeys of our heroes, and pinpoint the locations seen or mentioned in the series.
You will also receive a backer-exclusive AFK embroidered patch and all prior rewards.
Map measures 105 x 80cm at 300ppi
NOTE: shipping costs are not included in your pledge. Actual shipping costs will be calculated and charged in BackerKit after the campaign, based on your location.
INCLUDES:
AFK Season 3 on DVD or BLU-RAY
HD Digital downloads of new episodes
Stream AFK episodes with one month of Fantasy Network access
Custom Patch
World Map (Digital Edition)
Access to Production Diaries

campaign.story:
The magnetic parts attach seamlessly to all ferromagnetic materials-like your fridge, a locker or a whiteboard, for example. Simply move the track, connector and trick pieces around for an exciting brand new marble challenge. 
PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

PLAY





PLAY

We’re two industrial designers with backgrounds in woodworking and engineering who set out to create a fun, never-ending, always-engaging super-puzzle.
We wound up with an extensive system of modular magnetic units that we just can’t keep our hands off of. So we decided it was time to share the fun and excitement with you all.


 Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While there are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a brand new product, we've minimized both by having the entire process, from production to delivery, already set and arranged.

We have already signed agreements with key suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype has been finalized. We have the required technical expertise when it comes to product design. 

All of this, along with our strategic partnerships with experienced crowdfunding and fulfillment experts, leaves little room for error and ensures quick delivery.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
LAST 24 HOURS! 
Skies of Sordane is live!  
The Skies of Sordane has now launched! After a bit of a delay (sorry about that everyone!), my team and I are now ready to present the Skies of Sordane Kickstarter!
This Kickstarter's goal is provide a high quality range airship and miniature STL files for your 3D printers (Both FDM and resin printers!). All miniatures will be test printed on multiple FDM and resin printers to ensure quality. After the campaign ends (if successfully funded) we will roll out miniatures after they are tested and completed!
All miniatures will be sculpted for 32mm/35mm scale!
Note: This is for digital files only. Physical products will have to be purchased from our licensed sellers.
Why Kickstarter? 
My name is Benny, I've been playing D&D for over 20 years now and love that I can still be inspired by others. As most of you can probably tell, I was inspired by Eberron this time! I said to myself “I need some airships in my life!” .. I couldn’t stop writing lore and before I knew it, Sordane and its Skies were born!
Kickstarter allows us to present to you all the work we have been doing and the work we intend to complete and provide to the masses. We've take a long time, put in a great deal of effort and thought to create 5 awesome bundles each with their own unique feel while still remaining individually to one another within each bundle.
3D printing has opened the world up for us DMs to make supremely customized sessions for our players. Since becoming a 3D printing advocate, my players and I have enjoy vibrant sessions on terrain and settings that feel exactly as they should!
Core Bundles
There are 5 Core Bundles. Each bundle has 1 airship and 6 crew miniatures. All files will be printable on filament and resin printers (and will be tested on multiple printers of each type before sending out the files!). 
Reward Tiers
There are reward tiers for 1, 2 or all of the Core Bundles. There is even a cheaper all in pledge that gives everything except the 2 larger ships (Arrodan Syndicate and Cin'dar Navy Core Bundles' ships) that will not be printable on small resin printers. The 3 other ships will be printable on small resin printers! Large resin printers and normal medium FDM printers will be able to print all 5 ships.
Merchant Tier
We have a special merchant tier available to everyone who is looking to sell printed miniatures from our range of products. Our merchant licensing program is still in the works, but you can sign up for it right now! 
You will be paying a small admin fee and 10% from all sales. Every month you will send us a report in a format provided from us.
First year - $60 CAD admin fee (included in your pledge) + 10% of sales
Every year after - $30 license fee + 10% of sales
There will be no $100s paid yearly for your license fees. Stay tuned for more information on this as the campaign continues.
Printer Preparations
Ships will be keyed and sliced up for different sizes of printers. The 3 initial sizes are:
Allstretch goal ships will be printable on small resin printers and The Fleet reward tier with only 3 of the ships, will include every stretch goal just like The Armada tier. The only difference is the absence of the 2 large ships!
Small resin printers from Photon and Mars sizes and up. 
Medium sized FDM printers like the Ender 3 and up
Large volume resin printers like the Transform.
Aesthetics
The aesthetics of Sordane and its many airships and races, are inspired by arcanapunk fantasy. The world is very much still high fantasy (dragons, swords, magic, etc), but magic makes life more interesting, deadly and ultimately more fun by introducing a high level of technology created from magic! It is entwined into every element of the existence of this world. 
Note: if you don't like the way something looks, the stretch goals will provide great amounts of additional miniatures and modular options for the core minis and ships. Please don't be afraid to make recommendations of stuff you would like to see in the stretch goals! Only the first initial stretch goals are set. More will come later!
Cin'dar Navy Corsairs from the Cin'dar Navy Core Bundle
The Gleaming Shard from the Artificer Guilds Core Bundle
Testing out some homebrew rules with a couple of the ships =)
Shoal Class Trade Barge from the Merchant Guilds Core Bundle
Size comparison of the 5 Core Bundle ships!
Cin'dar Navy
The Cin'dar Navy is one of the greatest fighting forces in the skies of Sordane. They are well equipped and patrol, not only their own territory, but that of neighbouring nations that pay tribute to the crown of Cin'dar for its protection of their trading and passenger routes.
The Ship - Roshan Class Cruiser - These massive ships are the main battle might of the Cin'dar Navy. Aside from the legendary Titan Class Battleships, they are equipped with powerful fighting forces and impressive armaments. There are almost no other ships known to the continent that exists that can go 1 on 1 with a Roshan Class Cruiser.
The Crew - Cin'dar Corsairs - The Cin'dar Corsairs are the grizzled backbone of the Cin'dar Navy. Ranging from eager fresh recruits to war-hardened veterans, the Cin'dar Corsairs are a righteous organisation of warriors that sail the skies of Bordair exterminating pirates and keeping the peace - Cin'dar's peace...
Cin'dar Navy Core Bundle
Merchant Guilds
The world of Sordane has 9 continents and many nations on each of them. The powerful Merchant Guilds control most of the economic life blood. They travel the skies moving people, resources and riches all around the globe to seek their piece of the pie and live better lives.
The Ship - Shoal Class Trade Barge - The Shoal Class Trade Barge is a mainstay in the Merchant Guilds of Sordane. Heavily armoured, slow, but reliable, they populate the skies of the trade routes and above the major cities. The Trader Guilds save money and spend less on their ships. Opting for the less expensive Shard Blimps. Powered by engines with smaller crystal shards providing magical vapors. While slower and less advanced, they attract less attention from raiders and pirates.
The Crew - Mercenaries - The Merchant Guilds often hire mercenaries to travel the skies with them. These mercenary contracts are often short term as typically adventurers will barter for payment and free passage from one city to another parting ways on arrival in order to provide protection. Pirates need be wary for these seemingly innocuous ships can often contain a very combat capable crew of guardian adventurers.
Merchant Guilds Core Bundle
Arrodan Syndicate
The Arrodan Syndicate is known as the Arrodan Guild by most. But  unlike most, they live outside the law in most of the nations where their operations can be found. Their size and influence provide their leadership with unparalleled protection from the authorities in the nations in which they operate and some even say they run several nations as a shadow organisation. No one knows their true numbers and they are entirely nomadic in nature and they are spread far and wide.
The Ship - Geshtar Class HQ Airship - The Geshtar HQ ships are from where the Syndicate operates out of. These flying fortresses have entire communities living aboard them. They are slow, but incredibly powerful and the focal point of any large scale battle. Few ships command the respect that even 1 of these monstrosities does.
The Crew - Ardragoons - The warriors of the Syndicate are known as the Ardragoons. They are a fierce and loyal fighting force of powerful wizards and fighters. Children are stolen from orphanages or taken from defeated enemies. Ardragoon training methods rely on creating new family bonds within the group. Indoctrination is how they operate and power is what they respect.
Arrodan Syndicate Core Bundle
Carren Pirates
The Carren Pirates are one of many criminal organisations. While not massive, they are  well known for operating along the Chill Mountains between the nations of Cin'dar and Kaydlen. Their numbers are large enough to require frequent patrols from both nations in order to stem the acts of piracy in the region.
The Ship - Sintel Class Frigate
The Sintel Class Frigates  are a dated, still used, Cin'dar Navy mainstay. They are cheap, reliable and battle ready. After the war with the Oldathar nation, Cin'dar decommissioned older frigates and left them in storage yards. During a great heist, the pirate king Histalethen broke in with his crews and stole 20 older decommissioned Sintel Frigates.
The Crew - Carren Raiders
The Carren Raiders come from all over Bordair. Typically poor or less well off citizens of the various nations are recruited when they are young and impressionable. They are promised riches and freedom from past hardships. They often have deep connections with the well organised crime syndicates in the larger cities where the Carren Raiders need help to sell their ill-gotten gains.
Carren Pirates Core Bundle

Artificer Guilds
The Artificer Guilds across Sordane have a reputation for creating the most useful, powerful and dangerous items in the world. There are many guilds, but only few hold enough power to create such powerful ships as The Gleaming Shard. Crews often consist of wizards, artificers and their bodyguard creations.
The Ship - The Gleaming Shard
The Gleaming Shard is one of the most advanced ships in Sordane. While there are other comparably powerful ships, when complimented with it's powerful crew, it's nearly unstoppable. The Shard is also used by the guild to study the stars, nature of the surface and the volatile nature of Sordane.
The Crew - Watchers of the Shard
The Watchers of the Shard are a group of powerful artificers and guardians personally selected by Jexal to crew the Gleaming Shard - pride of the guild. These crew are battle hardened and employ all manner of magical aerial tactics. 
Artificer Guilds Core Bundle
Kickstarter Exclusive Monster Mini
The Arcane Dragon will be available to the following reward tiers for free:
The Fleet
The Armada
Merchants of Sordane
It's just added value on top of everything else. I really hope that those of you who are on the lower tiers don't feel left out. Nothing is being taken away from your pledges and you're still getting the 2 Skycoaches completely free no matter what tier you are on. That's still some pretty awesome value!
If I know anything about Lee and his abilities, this dragon is going to be AMAZING. Head on over to his Patreon and check him out. https://www.patreon.com/minimonstermayhem/posts.
Note: If you upgrade your pledge or late pledge to one of the included tiers up until the end of May, you will still receive the dragon file. After that, it will never be sold again.
Kickstarter Exclusive Arcane Dragon (lore to follow later)
50 Cast n Play Bases For All Tiers!
Cast n Play have provided us with 50 of their bases for ALL TIERS. You read that right. We just added a ton of beautiful bases to our campaign for you to print out for your minis. They feature many different useful terrains!
Playable Interiors
We unlocked them at $160k and that will allow us to make interiors for every ship in the campaign. This Stretch Goal will add some initial development time to each Core Bundle, but we will still try to get the bundles out as we had planned before (one at a time and release them likely in pairs or singular 1 month apart or so).
If you are not interested in printing your ship with the playable interiors, you can still print the solid form pieces of each ship. This is simply an added option =)
All 4 levels of the Carren Pirates Sintel Class Frigate
Prototype Work in Progress
As you can see from the images, we have finished the first draft of the ship, but there will be more work required as we go forward and we will be continuing to review and improve. Some things are final, some things are not. This ship will be the biggest of the medium ships (some of the stretch goal ships may be on this level as well like the brain flayers).
There a few things to note about the ships and their interior designs going forward:
The ships will have open spaces and closed rooms like you see on the lowest level of the example ship and the 3rd level with the engine room, brig and cannon battery. Lots of space, but they will have predefined areas
On the prototype the internal doors are solid, but we will be engineering a way for them to either be removable or able to open! Stay tuned for updates =)
The main deck or the "2nd level" of the Carren Pirate Sintel Class Frigate
The main deck or the "3rd level" of the Carren Pirate Sintel Class Frigate
Ship Dimensions
The dimensions of the Carren Pirate Ship are the largest of the 3 medium ships in the Core Bundles. It is about 70 cm long, 26 cm wide (excluding the propellers), and about 8-9 cm in height per level. It's not small =). The interior you get is expansive. I already have multiple sessions planned on this bad boy. The Merchant Shoal Class Barge and The Gleaming Shard are both around 50 cm long each and a little bit skinnier in deck space than the Sintel Frigate. They will each have 1-2 internal decks along with the top deck. The Arrodan Syndicate Geshtar and the Cin'dar Navy Roshan Cruiser will both have 4-6 decks (they are big!)
This specific ship will be one of the 3 medium ships (and all stretch goal ships) that will be pieced and keyed for small resin printers from the Anycubic Photon and larger. It's obviously not a quick build, but it will be with you forever and it will provide many great playing experiences. I am currently printing off the prototype right now on my Transform printers so I should have some updates for you of actual printed ship layers in a couple of days. Look for updates on the smaller sliced and keyed versions coming soon!
Note: There will be assembly instructions with every ship for each of the different sizes of sliced versions! (small resin, medium, etc)
The main deck or the "4th level" of the Carren Pirate Sintel Class Frigate
As promised, I have taken 4 popular Stretch Goals that were unsuccessfully voted for from the survey and moved them over to addons for people to help chip to reach more Stretch Goals!
These 4 Addons are just that - additional content. These would have been developed outside of the campaign eventually, but since we want to give you guys a chance for more stretch goals, we are adding them to the back end of the campaign for that extra push! (see below for How It Works)
How It Works
On each Addon, you will see a dollar amount (in Canadian dollars!) to add to your pledge for each addon. Simply change your pledge and increase the $ amount for the number of addons you want. You will be allowed to select your addons in the MyMiniFactory pledge manager at the end of the campaign
Increasing Your Pledge Amount
If you're not sure how to increase your pledge amount, it's pretty simple. Just go to the top of this campaign page and click the button that says "Manage your pledge" 
From here, you will click on "Change your pledge" and simply increase the $ amount by which addons you would like! For example, the Roc + the Rules Guide would be an additional CA$14. All of them would be CA$ 34 .
Delivery
Addons will be done after the Core Bundles are delivered. Same as the regular stretch goals! (The Rules Guide may come out earlier).

By popular request, we now have a Social Stretch Goal that we can reach! If we get 100 backers from the shared link below, we will unlock 3 unique halfling pterodactyl riders! (Please make sure you tell your friends to actually pick a tier - $1 donations will not be counted towards this goal!) - We have unlocked this stretch goal!!
UNLOCKED!
Stretch Goal Link:  https://bit.ly/2HAT5cV

MyMiniFactory Pledge Manager
Whenever we are ready to start delivering files, currently planned for April tentatively,  your pledge will be accessible via the MyMiniFactory Pledge Manager.
The MyMiniFactory Pledge Manager is designed for seamless STL file fulfillment. Gain instant access to your pledge, enjoy upgrade options and even purchase additional add-ons as they’re released.
None of the hassle of 3rd party digital downloads. No fear of expiring links. Plus the opportunity to make a late pledge if life was too hectic to catch our Kickstarter before the funding deadline.
How it works.
1. Login to your MyMiniFactory account through the link emailed to you from MyMinifactory - or register through the private link.
2. Click on “My Library” from your profile.
3. Your pledges will be automatically and instantly accessible through the “Objects Shared with me” collection of your library.
4. You can view the campaign, upgrade your pledge or add on through the “Campaign” section of your library where our pledge manager will live.
 

Show our talented team some love!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This Kickstarter is 100% digital STL files. We have several already made and printed for proof of concept. We are new to the space of STL file creation, but have lots of experience in the community of 3D printing and literally decades of experience with tabletop games both war gaming and role playing!

Core pledge goals and stretch goals will be aimed to be delivered when ready and as soon as they have been tested! There is no set delivery date for everything, but we are aiming to release the first STL files in late April / early May and go from there!

We will be as transparent and clear as humanly possible throughout the entire process. Even after we release any STL, full support to fix all issues and assist in printing will be available!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Print & Paint Competition! + 2 new Deckhands! + Update on crews and ships
updates.update_content:
2 New Deckhands!
We have 2 more deckhands for you to download! Simply go to your MyMiniFactory Library -> Campaigns and you should see the Deckhands Pack 2 with these two beauties in there!

updates.update_userinfo: 2nd Mini Ship Released - Roshan Cruiser! Painting Competition
updates.update_content:
Roshan Cruiser Mini Ship Released!
Just a quick one today, everyone. The Roshan Cruiser mini ship has been released! That's 2 of the mini ships finished. As soon as all of the large ships are done (we are actually very close to having all of the stretch goal ships finished) we will finish all of the mini ships =). This mini ship is available to all "all-in" ship pledges, including the "Ships Only" pledge. Also, the Cin'dar Navy Core Bundle will give you access to this ship!

The Print & Paint Competition is over!
We did it! After months of printing, we have had over 110 entry submissions into the print and paint competition. Totally shocked with the stunning amount of entries!

We will be judging them over the next 1 - 2 weeks to come up with all 10 winners! Good luck to everyone who entered and thanks to all those who submitted all of these beautiful pieces of artwork.

updates.update_userinfo: Next Stretch Goal Ship Released! Print & Paint Only 4 Days Left!
updates.update_content:
Kraken Frigate Released!
Hey everyone! well, here we go, the next ship is ready for release. We are nearing the end of our ships release schedule. It has been a long journey to get to this point and the work and resources involved has been more than I imagined from the start, but we have made it through, built the team, and we are almost done with all of the ships!

Dragon Hunting Airship Freebie from Lair Released!
Hey everyone. 
We have finished the airship we did in partnership with Lair and their Legendary Dragons Kickstarter. If you had any of the following tiers, you will receive this freebie ship (It was not a campaign stretch goal!)

updates.update_userinfo: Dragon Hunter Ship Delayed Until Monday!
updates.update_content:
Quick Update!
Hey everyone. Just a quick Friday update! 
The Dragon Hunting Airship was supposed to come out today, but we had to go back and edit some files last minute so we have to delay the release of it until next Monday! Really sorry for the delay. But there is a teaser for the new crew coming next month!

updates.update_userinfo: 3 Weeks Left for Airship Print & Paint! Dragon Hunter Ship Coming this Friday!
updates.update_content:
Airship Print & Paint Competition Ending in 3 Weeks! May 31st!
The competition is coming to a close soon. The final time for entry is before June 1st 2021 at 12:01 am EST. This means that you have right until midnight on May 31st (EST) to submit your entry on the competition page! Please mark it in your calenders. I know a ton of you have been working hard on larger ships to enter and I'm really excited to see what the final entries will bring in the next few weeks! Remember, the prize pool is absolutely massive! Over $7,000 in prizes spread between places 1st - 10th!

updates.update_userinfo: Halfling Riders Released! 5th deckhand released! Stretch Goal ships coming soon!
updates.update_content:
Good midweek, Sordanians!
We have been hard at work finishing stretch goal ships and trying to find people to do the crews to the level we want (honestly this has been the biggest challenge of 2021 for us!), doing the new Kickstarter and planning for the next one! Arcane Minis really is starting to grow into a well oiled machine and it's all thanks to the original backers from this Kickstarter!
Dragon Hunter Ship Test Printing

updates.update_userinfo: Skies of Sordane - We made a board game! It's game test time!
updates.update_content:
Good day, all! Board Game Time!
This is a bit of a unique update today. There is nothing specifically campaign related at the moment! I have come to notify you all that, if you weren't already aware, we have been developing a strategy war game for the last 10 months or so - a board game. We are currently running beta (alpha if we're being honest) testing to get a sense of the general mechanics, get feedback on all aspects of the game from the community and basically just get some early feedback on how it plays and what you think.
What is this board game all about??

campaign.story:
*This campaign is for a set of digital STL files - no physical products*
The Beautiful Night Pinup Set is the first Kickstarter by Bella Nacht - 3D Studios, but hopefully not the last.  
I poured my heart into every one of these ladies, and I learned so much as I finished each of them and moved on to the next. 
Bella Nacht is a one-woman project, but I can't claim sole credit for its existence. 
Without the constant interruptions from one fat cat, the never-ending encouragement from my university lecturer Conor O'Kane (@cokane on IG) and the butt-whoopin'-get-it-done attitude from my grandmother (on a daily basis), I wouldn't have even attempted this project to begin with. 
 Artstation | Instagram | Twitter | Bella Nacht FB Group | Bella Nacht Discord
The core set is made up of 8 lovely ladies. You will receive the digital files for each one. These models are ideal for resin printers, but suitable for FDM printers as well. 
 What will you receive?
Each figure has been exported as a high-quality STL file. 
The products will be delivered via Gumroad, so the files will always be available in your online library in case you ever lose your downloaded files -anything can happen- this also ensures you'll receive any updates that may become available with minimum hassle. 
*These models are 75mm tall - give or take a few mm depending on the model's pose* 
FREE DEMO FILE AVAILABLE - Click and use code 'opheliademo' at checkout to download.
_______________________________________________________________
1 piece - body and base combined
_______________________________________________________________
2 files - Body and base separate - she can stand without the base
_______________________________________________________________
3 files. Base and body combined, base and body separated
_______________________________________________________________
2 files - body and base separate
_______________________________________________________________
1 piece - body and base combined
_______________________________________________________________
3 pieces - body and base separate - base and body combined
_______________________________________________________________
1 piece - body and base combined
 _______________________________________________________________
You amazing humans made this happen.
Stretch goals are currently being sculpted and will be released shortly after the Core set is released, or as they're finished. They will be announced and posted as they're unlocked. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Ophelia, Celestria, Belladonna, Livana, Radella, and Rhodanthe have gone topless for the first stretch goal. To comply with Kickstarter's rules, I've posted renders in my Facebook Group Here and the Discord Channel to avoid any issues. 
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Work-in-progress
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
WIP Coming Soon
Early WIP, subject to changes and updates

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WIP Coming Soon
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Unlocked at 10k. This is a one-woman project, I'm catching up with you amazing humans.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Three Sisters

.
.
.
Rules
Base Tier:
By purchasing the base tiers, you agree that both the digital files and the printed versions of the Beautiful Night models may not be sold commercially.   You must not profit from these models in any way. 
Commerical Tier:
By purchasing the commercial tier, you agree that the digital files may not be shared or sold. The printed versions of the models CAN be sold in whatever outlet you wish. You may not use my renders or images for your product or display photos. You must create your own images for the products. 
I must be credited as the original artist. Bella Nacht, Bella Nacht 3D Studios, Blythe Thompson - any of these are suitable as well as a link to one of my social media profiles.
Only the physical products may be sold, not the digital files. 
 Test prints 
Printed and painted by Conor O'Kane - Click to follow his Instagram
 From left to right
Ophelia - 85mm
Celestria - 150mm
Alvara - 75mm
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This project is for a set of STL files (digital files) so risks are truly limited. Any issues that may arise with the models can be amended, upgraded and delivered to all backers. 

Some minor changes may be made to the models as the Kickstarter progresses, to improve printing quality. 

The core 8 models of the Beautiful Night Pinup Set have been sculpted and are ready to be delivered. 

Stretch goals will be delivered shortly after the release of the core set. The first 2 are currently being sculpted. 

Should any delays occur, there will be 100% transparency throughout the process and all files will be delivered regardless. 

For the custom backers, I intend to begin sculpting your orders in April. However, in March 2020 I am moving from Australia to New Zealand, there could be a possible delay in start time depending on how smoothly the transition goes (or I could start in March if everything goes well!). 
Each one will be sculpted in the order of backers. The first backer of that tier will receive their custom model first, etc. 

WARNING: Placing supports on boobs or butts will result in my coming to your home. taking your print away, and forcing you do it over again.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
